uppercaseValidation: Password must contain at least one uppercase character.

q1A: Tamam is an Android application for task management designed to help users organize their tasks, enhance productivity, and achieve their goals efficiently.
q2: 2. How do I get started with Tamam?
q2A: To get started with Tamam, register with a valid email address and password. You can then log in with that email address and password, or directly with your Google Gmail account.
q3: 3. Is Tamam available on multiple platforms?
q3A: No, Tamam is only available on Android. You can download the latest version from Google Play.
q4: 4. How can I add tasks in Tamam?
q4A: To add tasks in Tamam, press the add button on the home screen. Fill out the task title, description, due time, category, and priority.
q5: 5. How can i add new categories in Tamam?
q5A: To add new categories in Tamam, choose "Add Category" in the category selection screen. Fill out the category name, icon, and color.
q6: 6. Can I customize notifications in Tamam?
q6A: Unfortunately, you can't customize notifications in Tamam at this time.
q7: 7. How do I sync tasks across devices?
q7A: Tasks in Tamam automatically sync across devices when logged in with the same account. Ensure you are connected to the internet for seamless synchronization.
q8: 8. Is my data secure with Tamam?
q8A: Yes, we prioritize the security and privacy of your data. We use Google Firebase to handle data, ensuring the highest security.
q9: 9. What should I do if I encounter issues with the app?
q9A: If you experience any issues or have questions, feel free to contact our support team. You can find all contact information in the "About Us" section. We are here to assist you.
q10: 10. How can I suggest new features or improvements?
q10A: We value your feedback! If you have suggestions or ideas for improvement, you can contact us immediately.
q11A: Focus Mode enables you to concentrate more on your tasks, calculates the total time you've worked on them, and closes notifications to ensure focus.
faqDescription: Thank you for choosing Tamam! We hope it enhances your productivity and makes task management a breeze.
